called by my name. To be called by the Lord's name is to accept the covenants and ordinances, such as baptism and temple work. By accepting these covenants and ordinances, we will be gathered by the Lord in the last days (43:5-6).

created/formed. Compare 43:1, which also uses the terms created and formed.

my glory. Moses 1:39 explains God's glory—"to bring to pass the immortality and eternal life of man."
